message_2:
To simplify the given rational expression, we first factor out the common terms in the numerator.

(5x^2 - 25x) / (x - 5)

Factor out 5x from the numerator:

5x(x - 5) / (x - 5)

Now, we can cancel out the common factor (x - 5) from the numerator and denominator:

5x

So, the simplified rational expression is:

5x
